refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: There a two instances of the installer:

listitem.para: &BasicMiKTeXInstaller; is used to set up a basic &MiKTeX; system. All required resources are embedded in the installer, i.e., nothing else needs to be downloaded from the Internet.

&MiKTeXNetInstaller; is used to set up a complete &MiKTeX; system. In a first step, all required resources will be downloaded from the Internet. In a second step, a complete &MiKTeX; system is installed.
